title: Equal Employment Opportunity (EEO/EEOC) posters
dataVerified: None (informational), EEOC contact, discrimination complaint process
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents fake EEO posters. Domain binding verifies EEOC (eeoc.gov). Federal posting requirement (employers with 15+ employees). Employee rights notification. Discrimination complaint access.
